item.title: Formula-1 Friend
item.description: About Please refer to F1-Friend for description and working. Programming Languages: JavaScript,HTML,CSS Frameworks: NodeJS with (Express.js),AngularJS,Material Design,AmCharts Web Frameworks: ergast-api,ergast-client-nodejs

item.title: About
item.description: I am currently pusrsuing my Master’s in Computer Science with focus on Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence at Portland State University. I have previously worked as a Software Engineer and built backend and frontend web software. At present I am learning about current trends in Deep Learning with Computer Vision to solve complex problems. I believe in constant growth through learning, contribution, and collaboration with problem solvers. In my free time, I like to travel, listening to uplifting EDM tunes, watching adrenaline rushing sports and reading books on Psychology.
